TextView.android:text:
App has been updated!

What's new:

Fixed notification percentages being off. Wondering why notifications haven't been working? Yeah that's fixed now. Go to settings, fix up the percentages, and click the retrieve data button again. The search function for the price history also had a small glitch, I patched that out as well. Hate how I made the button bright blue? I'll put that back in a few days, I just wanted my older users to notice it was there. Because part of me is guessing this is just a bunch of text that most of you will ignore.

Like the app? Do me a favor and tell your skyblock friends it exists. I made it free and ad free so people would actually to use it. Because I want to finally crash the skyblock economy. So help me do it.
